We try to maintain a list of publications that have used the **meta.arrR** package. If you have used **meta.arrR** in your own work, we would love to hear from you. Please file an issue on GitHub so we can add your work to this list or contact us via [e-mail](mailto:mhk.hesselbarth@gmail.com).
